name: King's Redemption
description:
A lone king stands on a chessboard. Can you outdance your opponents? Click on the circles when the outer and inner circles match.

Features four different difficulties (accessible through the settings menu on the main page) which affect how to interact with the level:

Auto Mode: The game plays itself with no input from the user

Easy Mode: Click along with the rhythm. No need to move the mouse. Default.

Medium Mode: Move your mouse to the beat. No need to click.

Hard Mode: Click on the circles with the correct timing.

BETA Version: Currently, there are three levels available, corresponding to the rook, bishop, and knight.

Controls:

Space: Reset level

Any other key: Alternative to clicking during levels
